Title: Pokemon: Pichu to Pikachu
Description: ["Pikachu meets the Pichu brothers and goes on an adventure through the city with them while trying to get back to the building where the rest of Ash's Pokemon are."]
Related: ['Parent story: Pokemon', 'Other: Pokemon Movie 03: Kesshoutou no Teiou Entei']
